import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ManageBooks(){const[books,setBooks]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();const fetchBooks=()=>{axios.get('/api/books').then(res=>setBooks(res.data)).catch(err=>alert('Failed to load books.'));};const handleDelete=id=>{if(window.confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this book?')){axios.delete("/api/books/".concat(id)).then(()=>{alert('Book deleted successfully');fetchBooks();// Refresh the list
}).catch(()=>alert('Error deleting book'));}};useEffect(()=>{fetchBooks();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83D\uDCDA Manage Books"}),books.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No books available."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:books.map(book=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-4 mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card h-100",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:book.imageUrl,className:"card-img-top",alt:book.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title",children:book.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-text",children:book.author}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:["\u20B9",book.price]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-warning",onClick:()=>navigate("/admin/update-book/".concat(book.id)),children:"\u270F\uFE0F Update"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-danger",onClick:()=>handleDelete(book.id),children:"\uD83D\uDDD1\uFE0F Delete"})]})]})]})},book.id))})]});}export default ManageBooks;
